name: Cursed Caverns
description:
NOTE: THIS GAME WAS MADE IN A WEEK FOR THE BRACKEYS GAME JAM 2022.2 WITH THE THEME: YOU'RE NOT ALONE

Warning! This game contains jumpscares, flashing lights and loud sounds!

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement

L Click - Flashlight On/Off

E - Open Chest

Escape - Quit

You have fallen down into a mysterious cave. After walking around you realize that you are not alone in this cave as you start hearing more and more ominous growls. Your only equipment is a flashlight. Your objective is to unlock the door at the other side of the cave. But beware as monsters inhabit these caverns.

Monsters:

Stalk - Tall, shadow figure. Walks around the caverns until it spots the player, then it starts chasing them.

Guardian - Ghostly protector of chests. Afraid of light.

Surprise - Pesky monster that likes to hide in chests.

Please give feedback if you stumble upon any bugs/glitches!
